caption.p: Cyanobacteria blooms or non-blooms estimates published and of this work (summers of 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017) overlaid with an anomaly of rainfall time-series as in Figure 3B. Note that the anomaly of rainfall time-series ends in 2016. 1 refers to Odebrecht et al. ( 2005), and 2 Yunes et al. ( 1998a), 3 and 4 Rosa and Garcia ( 2013), and 5 refers to cyanobacteria estimates near the cities of Tapes and São Lourenço do Sul (offered by FEPAM, Brazil) (see text for more details).
